title: Dacor Discovery Series 48 Dual-Fuel Range ER48D Overview
description:
Buy Dacor Discovery 48 ER48D Free-Standing Stainless Steel Dual-Fuel Range Model ER48DSSCH - http://www.abt.com/product/27036/Dacor-ER48D.html

Features:
• 4.6 Cu. Ft. - Right Oven
• 2.6 Cu. Ft. - Left Oven
• IlluminaTM Burner Controls 
• TiltVueTM Control Panel 
• Dual Timer Digital Clock 10-Key Touch Pad 
• RapidHeatTM Bake Element (3100 watts) 
• RapidHeatTM Broil Element (3500 watts) 
• (2) SimmerSearTM Burners with Melting Feature (18000 BTU) 
• (2) Sealed Gas Burners (16000 BTU) 
• (2) Sealed Gas Burners (8500 BTU) 
• Dual Valve Burners for exceptional simmering 
• Perma-FlameTM Automatic Reignition 
• Pure ConvectionTM in both ovens 
• (4) Convection Modes 
• (2) Conventional Modes 
• Meat Probe 
• Automatic Hold 
• (2) Self-Cleaning Ovens 
• (3) 14 Wide Continuous Platform Grates 
• Sealed Cooktop Spill Basin 
• Halogen Lights
• Compatible with Renaissance ERV48-ER Raised Vent (Remote Blower required)
